Perceptor:

"Be ready for a treacherous encounter"said dryly Perceptor to Tucson"niether 
when you
defeat him gives him your back, or the same Prime tragedy will happen..."and
looking to Staton and legacy " We should decrease her energy levels... in
that way she couldnt try to escape or fight when we need her awake,  Prepare
the insolation of her memories and start deleting the programs"


"What are you planing to do?"said Kup

"We will do exactly what I did, with her memories contained and the progams
deleted, we will use a little of manipulation to tend to our favor her
spirit, it's when Rodimus will take the main role... "then he looked to 
ROdimus" Speaking about, when
Tucson release that energie before being captured in the intrusion to
BlackFortress, What was your Reaction Rodimus and what was Nighltight's?"

The predacon program stated to show more agressive and dominant than
Maximal's and it gain more control of Nightlight's spark.

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Monday, October 25, 2010 11:31 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: The Awakening

> <OLD>
>
> Tucson nodds and does as asked of him.
>
> "Very well. I'm happy to see that all of you are showing the initiative to
> have faith in the unknown. This will only strengthen our bonds and our
> forces.
>
> He then turns his head toward the direction of Rodimus.
>
> "I notice you're a tad quiet Rodimus, I understand if something is 
> bothering
> you and I'm here to listen if you need to get a few things off your mind. 
> I
> realize that you have been through a lot, and most of it unpleasent. I
> assure you Hydras will not get away with what he did to you and neither 
> will
> the rest of his lackies."
>
> A stone solid look of determination comes over Tucson's face. Like Optimus
> he was not one to shy away from working toward a resolve.
>
> " And if I must, if given the challenge, I will face him if he so choses, 
> on
> a one to one basis. He took something very valuable away from me, my
> comrades, and my friends. And now, it's time I took something away from
> him."

<NEW>

Rodimus shook his head slighly as he turned to leave the room, his
strides long and purposeful. "There are so many things to deal with at
once." He said as he walked, his face firm and resolute. "At them
moment we have our two objectives, locating and defeating Hydras as
well as learning more information about the Insect creatures that we
have just encountered."

Rodimus turned and looked at the others that had followed him out of
the room. He gestured expansively with his his left hand as he
continued to hold Elita in his right arm. They had all come to a stop
in a large chamber, the bridge was just a litle ahead of them. Cheetor
and Lord Elder also made thier way over to joim the group.

"Tuscon, since you are a Prime now and I am sure you are eager to
revisit yourself on Hydras, whoch will leave me to focus on the
insectoids." Rodimus smiled grimly as he tapped his head meaningfully.
"I believe that even though they have been able to learn much of us
Maximals and Autobots from what was stored in my head, I believe that
they left a few tid bits in my head as well."

(TAG)


Preston
